refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the next value from a counter.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Get the next value from a counter a init time by adding the increment and keeping the counter in the declared range.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: icnt -- the handle of a counter object from a call to cntCreate.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Calculate the next value from the counter object and return that value.
